name: Nova
description:
Sweet, deep, syrupy stone fruit flavors wrapped around a citrus explosion. It is messy, it is weird, and you probably shouldn't stare directly at it.  

Most of the edges smooth out after a week.
author: Philosaphucker

reviews.text: Another winner. This is super-refreshing, and another beautifully balanced mix. My only slight issue was a little harshness from INW Grapefruit, but this steeps out if you leave it a few more days. (10 day steep seemed to work well for me.) Thanks for sharing!
